headline.main: Food Program for Poor Mothers and Children Hasn't Worked

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: "W.I.C. Works" (editorial, April 6) takes me to task for having questioned the effectiveness of the supplemental food program for women, infants and children in The Wall Street Journal on April 2, particularly because "Congress likes W.I.C. and so does President Bush."
